description: Back up the target system's CD4PE installation

backup_dir.description: The directory on the target where the backups are stored

database_info.description: Information on the database to back up.

image.description: The pipelinesinfra image on the target system. Used to determine the version of CD4PE, and run volume tar backups.

version.description: The version of the cd4pe module used to create the backup.

volumes.description: The docker volumes on the target that should be included in the backup
